deficiencies.deficiency:
84300.1(b) Emergency Intervention Prohibition.  Any emergency intervention technique not approved for use as part of the licensee's emergency intervention plan must not be used at any time.
Staff have used the relaxation room that is not supposed to be used as a seclusion room as a seclusion room in New Yosemite.
deficiencies.correction_plan: By 8-10-12 staff will be scheduled to be retrained on the use of the relaxation room in New Yosemite no later than 8-31-12. Also, the supervisors that sign off on the IR's will note if any follow up with staff needs to occur for the next six months on the IR. Proof to be sent to CCL.

deficiencies.deficiency:
FIXTURES, FURNITURE, EQUIPMENT, AND SUPPLIES:

Hot water was measured at 98 degrees.
deficiencies.correction_plan: Facility will adjust hot water temperature between 105 to 120 degrees and will submit proof of correction to CCL by 10/31/2006.

deficiencies.deficiency:
BUILDINGS AND GROUNDS:

Resident's bedroom door knob fell off when turned.
deficiencies.correction_plan: Facility will repair or replace door knob and submit proof of correction to CCL by 11/17/2006.

deficiencies.deficiency:
FIXTURES, FURNITURE, EQUIPMENT, AND SUPPLIES:

Fireplace located in the living room area was not covered.
deficiencies.correction_plan: Facility will properly cover fireplace and will submit proof of correction to CCL by 11/17/2006.

deficiencies.deficiency:
BUILDINGS AND GROUNDS:

Five resident bedrooms did not have window coverings.
deficiencies.correction_plan: Facility will provide proper window coverings to all windows and submit proof of correction to CCL by 11/17/2006.

deficiencies.deficiency:
PERSONAL RIGHTS:
A client was locked in the kitchen when they were being unsafe.
deficiencies.correction_plan: IMMEDIATELY clients will not be locked in any room. Staff will be retrained on what to do when clients are in crisis. The sign in sheet will be sent to CCL.

deficiencies.deficiency:
HEALTH AND SAFETY CODE:

The facility does not have a way to get a hold of a facility manager at all times.
deficiencies.correction_plan: By 3-15-10 the facility will create a plan so that a facility manager can be contacted at all times. The plan will be submitted to CCL.
